alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:11PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN EDDY AND NORTHWESTERN LEA COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Caprock to 23 miles south of Maljamar. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Caprock, Maljamar, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport, Halfway, and Loco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
